label: EXPANDED_REREAD_ALL_SOURCES
session_type: Cowork Agent Teams — expanded reread: 12 docs + ChatGPT + entire.io cloud check

architecture.md.summary: iOS app architecture: polyvagal theory foundation, 8-agent Chronos Protocol v3 delegation format, multi-model bridge (6 providers), Azure Cosmos DB + Bayesian/Fourier data arch. 5 design principles: ADHD-first, passive>active, body before mind, minimum effective dose, cultural roots.

decisions.md.summary: ADR-001 through ADR-009. Key: ADR-001 reduced 10→8 agents, ADR-003 multi-model bridge, ADR-004 ADHD-first, ADR-005 passive profiling, ADR-006 hunter-gatherer calibration, ADR-007 three-tier memory, ADR-008 tiered routing cheap-first, ADR-009 cost-aware agent teams.

state_full.md.summary: Full project status. Completed: Chronos v3, bridge, paper outline, three-tier memory, PR#2. In-progress: wire bridge to .env, iOS MVP. Next: live tribunal, iOS scaffold, OpenAI Prism, entire.io cloud, biometrics, monetization.

models_catalog.md.summary: 6 providers (OpenAI, Gemini, DeepSeek, OpenRouter, HuggingFace, Azure AI Foundry), 25+ models, pricing $0-$14/M tokens, benchmarks (AIME, MATH-500, SWE-bench), agent-to-tier mapping table.

prism_paper_outline.md.summary: Mathematics of Rhea — 8-section academic paper: Introduction, Biological Foundation (polyvagal+interoception), Mathematical Framework (state space, Fourier, Bayesian, MPC, Thompson sampling), Multi-Model Tribunal, Cross-Cultural Validation, System Architecture, Evaluation Plan, Discussion.

article_gpt_pro_vs_cowork.md.summary: ChatGPT Pro ($200) vs Claude Cowork ($20-200) comparison. Pro wins deep math reasoning. Cowork wins workflows/tool orchestration/file management.

MVP_LOOP.md.summary: Closed-loop scheduler spec: state x_t=(sleep_proxy, energy, time_budget, friction), action set, reward/utility, safety constraints, online Bayesian updates.

ROADMAP.md.summary: 4 stages: Stage 0 (specs — DONE), Stage 1 (iOS MVP), Stage 2 (passive signals), Stage 3 (MPC optimization).

state.md.summary: Compact ≤2KB state: mission, deliverables, current status, immediate next steps.

core_context.md.summary: Intellectual genesis: 11-step origin chain from Gregorian calendar critique → Rhea app. 8-level symbolic power framework. Polyvagal-interoception bridge. Anankastic+ADHD paradox. 42 calendar systems catalogued.

state_agents_core.md.summary: 9 agents: Rhea(Root,cheap→balanced), Chronos(Time,cheap), Gaia(Body,cheap→balanced), Hypnos(Sleep,cheap), Athena(Strategy,balanced→expensive), Hermes(Communication,cheap), Hephaestus(Build,balanced→expensive), Hestia(Safety,cheap), Apollo(Insight,cheap→reasoning). Each has mythic role, scientific domain, cost tier policy, escalation rules.

soul.md.summary: Base human config: ADHD identity, 7 core principles, communication style, hard constraints, state vector x_t=[E_t, M_t, C_t, S_t, O_t, R_t] (Energy, Mood, Cognitive, Sleep, Social, Routine).
